ION AL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dr. Sam L. Becker
Executive Secretary
Television Center
State University of Iowa
609 Tenth Avenue
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
Inviting Hoban, Carpenter and Wells Foshay to serve on
committee. Leaving Merrill off. Hence:
* Becker
Ellery
Hoban
Foshay
Evans
Harwood
Carpenter
Westley
Smythe (back in February)
Wire or call if not ok.
Best,
HJS:jp
Harry J .{JSkornia
President
